transcription.text: Is Blonde, a fictionalised look at Marilyn Monroe's life by Melbourne director Andrew Dominik, honouring or exploiting the star's legacy? Reviews are divided, but Iconic images from Monroe's life and work, along with the film's recreation of these moments are being used on social media to damn and praise the film, ensuring Monroe's complex role in pop culture continues to resonate.

work.title: Don't really know how I feel about this movie...
